A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a film the trilogy needs to recover from\, and with one film left that's just not possible.\nThe Force Awakens did a good job of setting the trilogy up\, the characters worked\, the direction of travel was pitched but not set \, and most importantly the framework of a story was established.\nTLJ destroyed all of that\, knocking down all of the hard work done to set it up. Very very disappointing
